item.title: Jay add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Jay add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jay add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Jay add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I speak to everyone in the same way, whether he is the garbage man or the president of the university." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Jay add a quote by Dorothy Allison
item.description: "The horror of class stratification, racism, and prejudice is that some people begin to believe that the security of their families and communities depends on the oppression of others, that for some to have good lives there must be others whose lives are truncated and brutal." -- Dorothy Allison

item.title: Jay add a quote by Frederick Douglass
item.description: "Where justice is denied, where poverty is enforced, where ignorance prevails, and where any one class is made to feel that society is an organized conspiracy to oppress, rob and degrade them, neither persons nor property will be safe." -- Frederick Douglass

item.title: Jay add a quote by Paulo Freire
item.description: "[T]he more radical the person is, the more fully he or she enters into reality so that, knowing it better, he or she can transform it. This individual is not afraid to confront, to listen, to see the world unveiled. This person is not afraid to meet the people or to enter into a dialogue with them. This person does not consider himself or herself the proprietor of history or of all people, or the liberator of the oppressed; but he or she does commit himself or herself, within history, to fight at their side." -- Paulo Freire

item.title: Jay add a quote by Matt Bernstein Sycamore
item.description: "If we eliminate the pressure to pass, what delicious and devastating opportunities for transformation might we create?" -- Matt Bernstein Sycamore

item.title: Jay add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Everybody can be great...because anybody can serve. You don't have to have a college degree to serve. You don't have to make your subject and verb agree to serve. You only need a heart full of grace. A soul generated by love." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Jay add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Jay add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "The dog is the most faithful of animals and would be much esteemed were it not so common. Our Lord God has made His greatest gifts the commonest." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Jay add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "A unjust law, is no law at all." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Jay add a quote by Peggy Munson
item.description: "I would like to know just what kind of nothing I am" -- Peggy Munson

item.title: Jay add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "We are saved by faith alone, but the faith that saves is never alone." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Jay add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "This life therefore is not righteousness, but growth in righteousness, not health, but healing, not being but becoming, not rest but exercise. We are not yet what we shall be, but we are growing toward it, the process is not yet finished, but it is going on, this is not the end, but it is the road. All does not yet gleam in glory, but all is being purified." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Jay add a quote by Leslie Feinberg
item.description: "I began to feel the pleasure of the weightless state between here and there" -- Leslie Feinberg

item.title: Jay add a quote by Leslie Feinberg
item.description: "Gender is the poetry each of us makes out of the language we are taught." -- Leslie Feinberg
